name: Boston comfort room
neighborhood_overview: Saint Peter church Bowdoin street health center and Cesaria restaurant
description:
It’s a large room with a queen bed and a large sofa. I also provide air mattress upon request.

The space
My space is located at the center of everything, 300 ft from the public transportation, a lot of restaurants and bars in the area. Close to South Bay, south end and Back bay. Easy access to orange and red line.

Guest access
Front and back patio

Other things to note
The guest who stays here more the one night will get some discount at our beauty salon and sauna at people’s choices unisex salon 250 Bowdoin street Dorchester Massachusetts and we provide free parking

License number
Str-409169
